name: Night at the Hospital
summary: Night at the Hospital is Team Snugglebunny’s visual novel entry for the Pulse Pounding Heart Stopping Dating Sim Jam of 2013 (PPHS). The first release was made in 5 days.
info:
• 游戏类型: Boy’s Love, Comedy, Horror(?)
  • 游戏引擎: Ren'Py
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 官方网站: http://nightatthehospital.vnovel.com/
